snippet: “Thank you for the work you do,” said William C. Thompson Jr., a Democrat and former city comptroller, as he accepted the endorsement from the traffic enforcement agents.
abstract: Trailside blog; William C Thompson Jr, Democrat and former city comptroller, accepts endorsement for New York City mayoral run from local chapter of New York CIty Uniform Traffic and Sanitation Enforcement Agents union.

byline.original: By MICHAEL M. GRYNBAUM and KATE TAYLOR

lead_paragraph: “Thank you for the work you do,” said William C. Thompson Jr., a Democrat and former city comptroller, as he accepted the endorsement from the traffic enforcement agents.

headline.main: Traffic Agents Endorse Thompson, and Vice Versa
headline.print_headline: Traffic Agents Endorse Thompson, and Vice Versa
